meanings.definition: Of or relating to prophecy or predicting the future.
meanings.sent1: The old book contained fatidical warnings about the coming storm.
meanings.sent2: The fortune teller's fatidical abilities amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The fatidical parrot predicted that it would rain jellybeans tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were so fatidical, they seemed to unveil the secrets of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The fatidical vision of the seer haunted the villagers for years to come.
